member.name: M:Media.Plugin.MediaImplementation.TakePhotoAsync(Media.Plugin.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions)
member.summary: Take a photo async with specified options
member.returns: Media file of photo or null if canceled

member.name: M:Media.Plugin.MediaImplementation.PickPhotoAsync
member.summary: Picks a photo from the default gallery
member.returns: Media file or null if canceled

member.name: M:Media.Plugin.MediaImplementation.TakeVideoAsync(Media.Plugin.Abstractions.StoreVideoOptions)
member.summary: Take a video with specified options
member.returns: Media file of new video or null if canceled

member.name: M:Media.Plugin.MediaImplementation.PickVideoAsync
member.summary: Picks a video from the default gallery
